akn:section.akn:heading: Establishment of a vessel identification system

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Secretary of Transportation shall establish a vessel identification system to make available information under section 12503 of this title for use by the public for law enforcement and other purposes relating to—
(b) The vessel identification system shall include information prescribed by the Secretary including—
(c) The Secretary may maintain information under this chapter in connection with any other information system maintained by the Secretary.
